Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
01.02.2007 SH SCR10170 BXA320B Added DEBC_DEBH to sort and replaced GroupLevel
DEBC_DEBC_SORT by DCMC_DEBC_DEBH
15.02.2006 SH SCR10418 BXA320B Uses MlsTrans function for contents
of <limit_type> (report language = client language)
27.01.2006 SH SCR10170 BXA320B Changed sort of DCMC to DCMC_ADMNO.
DCMC_CLNTNODE, BC_DEBC_SORT, DCMC_MARKCODE
26.01.2006 SH SCR10170 BXA320B Changed <heller_deb_nr> = DEBC_DEBH instead
of DCMC_DEBH_NO
04.01.2006 SH SCR10018 Added PI.SPECIALDELIVERYand PI.PRINTERQUEUE,
uses as argument for BXA900
01.07.2005 SH SCR8478 Removed XML reserved characters for DEBC_DEBC
04.05.2005 SH SCR8271 Update REPA_DATE with PI.DATE instead with
GNRL_NIGHTPROGRAMSDATE now
31.03.2004 SH SCR5836 Added v.TYPE (= DBA or DBF) and uses v.TYPE instead of
- hardcoded 'DAB' in BXA320A
08.03.2004 SH SCR5660 Moved WhereClause for DCMC selection from DB SQL to
- MAGIC SQL, for reason see SCR.
05.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
======= Build directories for TEMPLATES and OUTPUTDIRECTORIES =========
-- Use PI.OUTDIR as OutputDirectory for XML Files
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
In order to increase performance of GB730 Create Temporary file within a short:
1000 char
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- If PI.FILE = 'N' then v.TYPE = 'DBA'
... else if PI.FILE= 'A' or 'X' then v.TYPE = 'DBF'
(f.i. 'DAB' and 'DBF' uses different stylesheets for XML)
-- only if debtor clients were selected, we write XML otherwise the already
-- produced XML parts (Header/Footer) will be deleted and also
-- the stored REPA row will be deleted
-- Switch to client language (= report language)
-- Build final XML File
(Copy the header file to final file. If we don't do that, AS/400 will choose
- system default fo CCSID (EBCDIC) if we later on append with cat >>
- to a non-existing (new) final file ...)
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Delete created REPA row if no debtor clients were selected
-- Switch back to system language
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
-- Build partial invoice XML File
(Copy the first XML file to part XML file. If we don't do that, AS/400 will
-choose system default fo CCSID (EBCDIC) if we later on append with cat >>
- to a non-existing (new) final file ...)
-- Trigger to write totals, see T.S.
-- Build partial invoice XML File
(Copy the first XML file to part XML file. If we don't do that, AS/400 will
-choose system default fo CCSID (EBCDIC) if we later on append with cat >>
- to a non-existing (new) final file ...)

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DCMC_MARK_CODE, cast(sum(DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTC) as decimal(18,2)) from :1/DCMC, :1/DEBC WHERE DCMC_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO AND DCMC_ADMNO = :2 AND DCMC_CLNTNO = :3 AND DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTC <> 0 GROUP BY DCMC_MARK_CODE FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
